subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Pau Gasol, a 7-foot, 13-year N.B.A. veteran, was carefully weighing his many options during his first foray into being a free agent.
snippet: Pau Gasol, a 7-foot, 13-year N.B.A. veteran, was carefully weighing his many options during his first foray into being a free agent.
